attributes.action: Throw out/sack all MPs if Brexit isn't delivered as voted for in the refurendum
attributes.additional_details: Any MP that blocks the UK leaving the EU should be tried in the court of law for treason.
attributes.background: The people of the UK voted in favour of leaving the EU. We are a democracy and our vote to leave must be adhered to by the government. We didn't vote to stay, or leave with deals that still handcuff us to the EU, so failure to deliver Brexit at the end of March should mean all MPs are stood down.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views or opinions. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
